title: Modern Font
content:
The last few hours I've tried finding out what font this is, but I really can't find it!  
Zoe herself has no idea either, since someone created this for her.  
Can someone please help me?  
Thanks in advance!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113446im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_4587.png)

Font: 

 Arual
